title: Martians of the Millennium
description: When twelve year old Caleb Carter finds a package under a bus seat he's pumped. When that package turns out to be the video game he has been wanting for months he's psyched, but when he plays the game and his house catches on fire he's scared out of his mind. This is no ordinary fire. With this fire comes evil aliens and grouchy FBI officers who force Caleb and his friends to go back in time to some of the deadliest moments in American history so that they can close down all the portals that allow the aliens into our world.Come on an epic journey with Caleb Carter and his friends, Skye and Turner, on an adventure full of time travel, danger, laughs and (of course) aliens
author: A.R. Galltier
